events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund because this is not what I paid for.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect product delivery by the customer.
The case has been assigned to a customer service agent specialized in refund processing.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 1234567890 and I attached a clear photo showing the wrong item that was delivered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and you may keep the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response and solution! I appreciate being able to keep the item and get my money back.
Your refund has been processed successfully and should reflect on your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to make sure you received your refund and everything is now resolved to your satisfaction.
As we’ve confirmed the refund was received and the issue is resolved, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience!
